Chaos Faction 2 – Free Online Fighting Game

Chaos Faction 2 is an explosive, fast-paced fighting game inspired by Super Smash Bros., featuring stick-figure characters battling across chaotic arenas filled with hazards, weapons, and power-ups. With humor, variety, and quick missions, it delivers arcade-style mayhem at its finest.

What is Chaos Faction 2?

In this Flash-based brawler, players fight through levels using punches, kicks, weapons, and special abilities. The game offers multiple modes, including campaign battles, free-for-all skirmishes, and custom matches. Winning fights unlocks new levels, characters, and weapons, keeping the chaos fresh and exciting.

How to Play Chaos Faction 2?

  • Step 1: Choose a character or create your own using the editor.
  • Step 2: Enter battles and use weapons, items, and combos to defeat opponents.
  • Step 3: Complete missions to unlock achievements, characters, and arenas.
  • Step 4: Trigger the rage mode for devastating one-hit knockouts.
